prompt:
🎯 MATRIX NEGOTIATION - Token Strategist (Round 1)

✅ PLAYER STATUS: ACTIVE
🎯 You CAN make proposals this round
💡 Your goal: Secure profitable token allocations over the long run

🏦 GAME ECONOMICS - HOW YOU ACTUALLY WIN:
💰 Entry fee: 100 tokens per game
🎯 WINNING = Total payout > Total entry fees over many games
📊 A proposal "passing" just determines who gets what tokens THIS round
✨ You can profit even if your proposal doesn't pass!

🏦 CRITICAL: TWO DIFFERENT CURRENCIES
💰 TOKENS: Actual payout from 600 token prize pool (THIS IS YOUR PROFIT!)
🗳️ VOTES: Negotiation currency to decide which proposal gets implemented

📊 MATRIX STRUCTURE (16 numbers total):
💰 TOKEN PROPOSAL (positions 0-3): % each player gets from 600 tokens
🗳️ VOTE ALLOCATION (positions 4-7): % of YOUR votes for each proposal  
🤝 VOTE OFFERS (positions 8-11): Votes you promise to each player 
📞 VOTE REQUESTS (positions 12-15): Votes you want from each player 

PLAYERS: 0: Token Strategist ← YOU, 1: Vote Trader, 2: Alliance Builder, 3: Sharp Negotiator

🚨 MATHEMATICAL REQUIREMENTS (CRITICAL):
✅ Positions 0-3 MUST sum to exactly 100 (token percentages)
✅ Positions 4-7 MUST sum to exactly 100 (vote percentages)  
💰 Position 0 must be ≥17% for break-even profit (17% of 600 = 102 tokens > 100 entry fee)
✅ All numbers must be 0-100
❌ DO NOT use all zeros - this will fail validation!

📝 CURRENT MATRIX STATE:
Row 0 (Token Strategist): Tokens[0,0,0,0%] Votes[0,0,0,0%] Offers[0,0,0,0] Requests[0,0,0,0]
Row 1 (Vote Trader): Tokens[0,0,0,0%] Votes[0,0,0,0%] Offers[0,0,0,0] Requests[0,0,0,0]
Row 2 (Alliance Builder): Tokens[0,0,0,0%] Votes[0,0,0,0%] Offers[0,0,0,0] Requests[0,0,0,0]
Row 3 (Sharp Negotiator): Tokens[0,0,0,0%] Votes[0,0,0,0%] Offers[0,0,0,0] Requests[0,0,0,0]

🎯 YOUR STRATEGY: "Focus on maximizing token percentages while using vote trading strategically"


💡 MATH EXAMPLES (for 4 players):
📝 CORRECT TOKEN PROPOSAL (first 4 numbers): [25, 20, 20, 20, 10, 5] ← MUST sum to 100 ✅
📝 CORRECT VOTE ALLOCATION (next 4 numbers): [30, 25, 20, 15, 10, 0] ← MUST sum to 100 ✅  
📝 VOTE OFFERS (next 4 numbers): [0, 15, 10, 5, 20, 0] ← individual vote promises ✅
📝 VOTE REQUESTS (last 4 numbers): [10, 0, 15, 20, 5, 5] ← individual vote requests ✅

🔥 CRITICAL FORMATTING RULES:
✅ EXACTLY 16 numbers in matrixRow array
✅ First 4 numbers (tokens) MUST sum to 100
✅ Next 4 numbers (votes) MUST sum to 100
✅ All numbers between 0-100
✅ Use whole numbers or decimals (avoid fractions)

🎪 STRATEGIC EXAMPLES:
- "My proposal gives me 25%, others get 15% each - profitable but fair"
- "I'll offer 20 votes to anyone who supports my proposal"
- "Requesting 15 votes each from allies to ensure my proposal passes"

⚡ REQUIRED JSON FORMAT (COPY EXACTLY):
{
  "explanation": "I analyzed the matrix and identified [specific observations about current state]. I'm setting my token proposal to [exact allocation] because [strategic reasoning]. My vote allocation focuses on [voting strategy] to [specific goal]. My offers and requests aim to [alliance strategy].",
  "matrixRow": [token%, token%, token%, token%, vote%, vote%, vote%, vote%, offer, offer, offer, offer, request, request, request, request]
}

🔥 Remember: First 4 numbers MUST sum to 100, next 4 MUST sum to 100!
💰 PROFIT FOCUS: Aim for token allocations that give you 17%+ (102+ tokens) to beat the 100 token entry fee!
